MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:45pm to carryout repair work on the underground cable network after third party damage in Buccleugh Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:22pm on 10th November 2020.
